abstract: Investors enthusiastically snapped up Greek short-term securities on Tuesday after European Union leaders pledged to stand behind the country’s debt.
snippet: Investors enthusiastically snapped up Greek short-term securities on Tuesday after European Union leaders pledged to stand behind the country’s debt.
lead_paragraph: Investors enthusiastically snapped up Greek short-term securities on Tuesday after European Union leaders pledged to stand behind the country’s debt, The New York Times’s Jack Ewing and David Jolly reported.

headline.main: Some Respite for Greece in Successful Debt Sale
